DOC.criteria: 1 . Prostate cancer proven histopathology 2 . Unresectable metastasis 3 . Progressive disease , docetaxel/cabazitaxel naive docetaxel/cabazitaxel treat . 4 . Castration resistant disease confirm testosterone level ≤50 ng/ml prior androgen deprivation therapy ( ADT ) 5 . Positive 68GaPSMA11 PET/CT ( positron emission compute tomography ) diagnostic 177LuPSMA617 scintigraphy 6 . ECOG 02 7 . Sufficient bone marrow capacity define WBC ( white blood cell ) ≥2.000/μl , PLT ( platelet ) count ≥75.000/μl , Hb≥8.9 g/dl ANC≥1000 mm3 . 8 . Signing Informed Consent Form 1 . Less 6 week since last myelosuppressive therapy ( include Docetaxel , Cabazitaxel , 223Ra , 153Sm ) radionuclide therapy 2 . Glomerular Filtration Rate ( GFR ) < 40 ml/min 3 . Grade 3 toxicity serum creatinine use CTCAE v. 4.0 4 . AST ( aspartate aminotransferase ) ALT ( alanine transferase ) > 5xULN 5 . Urinary tract obstruction mark hydronephrosis
